statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -21 \\ -2 \\ 6 \\ 23 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -7 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
